titles.title: Election Mail Act of 2020
Election Mail Act of 2020
Election Mail Act of 2020
To require the United States Postal Service to treat election mail as first-class mail and deliver such mail at no cost to the sender, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on House Administration, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
